cookingTips: Ensure butter and cream cheese are fully softened (not melted) for smooth frosting
Beat on medium speed to incorporate air and create a fluffy texture
Add bourbon slowly while mixing to prevent the frosting from becoming too thin
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This frosting pairs well with chocolate or spice cakes. Do you prefer a stiffer frosting for piping or a softer frosting for spreading? I can adjust the bourbon amount accordingly.
